articles.title: Actress dies weeks after Oscars apology - news.com.au
articles.description: Native American activist Sacheen Littlefeather — who cemented her place in history when she declined actor Marlon Brando’s Oscar at the 1973 Academy Awards — has died, aged 75.
articles.content:
